thread.title: AR-15 Model Rifle Again Used in a Mass Shooting

author: Zusha Elinson
title: AR-15 Model Rifle Again Used in a Mass Shooting
text:
The gunman charged with killing 17 people at a Florida high school on Wednesday used an AR-15 model rifle, a style of gun that has become more commonly used in mass shootings in the past decade.
The AR-15 is a semiautomatic rifle that allows the user to fire rapidly and use high-capacity magazines.
Four out of the five deadliest mass shooting...
